testcase.name: The_Shiny_App_returns_a_proper_greeting

error.message: Error in `app_initialize(self, private, app_dir = app_dir, ..., load_timeout = load_timeout, ('test-shiny.R:3:3')

testcase.error:
Error in `app_initialize(self, private, app_dir = app_dir, ..., load_timeout = load_timeout, timeout = timeout, wait = wait, expect_values_screenshot_args = expect_values_screenshot_args, screenshot_args = screenshot_args, check_names = check_names, name = name, variant = variant, view = view, height = height, width = width, seed = seed, clean_logs = clean_logs, shiny_args = shiny_args, render_args = render_args, options = options)`: code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows
ℹ You can inspect the failed AppDriver object via `rlang::last_error()$app` ℹ AppDriver logs: {shinytest2} R info 23:09:18.12 Start AppDriver initialization {shinytest2} R info 23:09:18.18 Starting Shiny app {shinytest2} R info 23:09:18.80 Creating new ChromoteSession {shinytest2} R info 23:09:18.83 Error while initializing AppDriver: code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows {shiny} R stderr ----------- Loading required package: shiny {shiny} R stderr ----------- Running application in test mode. {shiny} R stderr ----------- {shiny} R stderr ----------- Listening on http://127.0.0.1:6268
Caused by error in `callback()`: ! code: -32602 message: Target position can only be set for new windows Backtrace: ▆ 1. ├─AppDriver$new(...) at test-shiny.R:3:3 2. │ └─shinytest2 (local) initialize(...) 3. │ └─shinytest2:::app_initialize(...) 4. │ ├─base::withCallingHandlers(...) 5. │ └─shinytest2:::app_initialize_(self, private, ..., view = view) 6. │ └─chromote::default_chromote_object()$new_session() 7. │ └─chromote:::create_session(...) 8. │ └─ChromoteSession$new(...) 9. │ └─chromote (local) initialize(...) 10. │ └─self$wait_for(p) 11. │ └─self$parent$wait_for(p) 12. │ └─chromote:::synchronize(p, loop = private$child_loop) 13. │ ├─promises::with_promise_domain(...) 14. │ │ └─domain$wrapSync(expr) 15. │ │ └─base::force(expr) 16. │ ├─base::tryCatch(...) 17. │ │ └─base (local) tryCatchList(expr, classes, parentenv, handlers) 18. │ │ └─base (local) tryCatchOne(expr, names, parentenv, handlers[[1L]]) 19. │ │ └─base (local) doTryCatch(return(expr), name, parentenv, handler) 20. │ └─base::stop(value) 21. └─shinytest2 (local) `<fn>`(`<smplErrr>`) 22. └─shinytest2:::app_abort(...) 23. └─rlang::abort(..., app = self, call = call)
